issue.title: Irobot hand fingers don't have joint transforms

content.raw:
To fix this, we need [IRobotHandPlugin.cpp](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/822c0cea0f272d7508cde4ee79ac6f06a95873f0/drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins/src/IRobotHandPlugin.cpp?at=update_irobot_hand) to publish `joint_states`, similar to what [SandiaHandPlugin.cpp does here](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/be43cd53fa1eb192e594ebf4f057406a6b86afc3/drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins/src/SandiaHandPlugin.cpp?at=default#cl-446),

(done) And we need to add `robot_state_publisher` nodes similar to what [`atlas_v3_sandia_hands_bringup.launch` does here](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/822c0cea0f272d7508cde4ee79ac6f06a95873f0/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_v3_sandia_hands_bringup.launch?at=update_irobot_hand#cl-8).
